content: Her mother knew that her eldest daughter had signed up for a drama seminar, but she had no idea that she was so deeply involved as to appear on stage.
translations: ita:Sua madre sapeva che sua figlia maggiore si era iscritta a un seminario sul dramma, ma non aveva idea che lei fosse cos√¨
